1.content: Before you were born, you were assigned to this fate. You do not realize it yet, but you are bound to the rules. First, which are you? The Fighter or the Sacrifice?
1.title: Fighter or Sacrifice?

choices: I am a guy, my Sacrifice is a girl
I am a girl, my Sacrifice is a guy
Both me and my Sacrifice are men
Both me and my Sacrifice are women
11.content: So you are the Fighter, the one who will protect the Sacrifice. What is your team like?
11.title: I am the Fighter

111.content:
Now you must answer who is your Sacrifice?

Dreaming: A young bespectaled girl named Kate is who is interested in books. She is in high school and appears to be a mix of French and American. She still has her ears

Compassionate: A buxom red-haired young woman named Jenna in college. She wears sexy outfits and does not have her ears anymore

Speechless: A cute plus-sized girl with long brown hair and a high IQ. Her name is Tanya and she does not have her ears anymore
111.title: The Name You Obey A

1113.content:
Good...good, now which Fighter are ou?

---
---

The Collosus: Kyle Eradius, you take your victory through your size and strength. Wielding swords and clubs, also wearing armor that is nigh impenetrable to protect your sacrifice. You aren’t the sharpest tool in the shed, but you have a massive heart, you have no preferences when it comes to girls, but mainly that is because you have no real interest in a girlfriend, you love football too much. You are the main defensive lineman on your football team.

You are built like a tank, extremely tall, around 6.4 and muscular with a square jaw, you have black hair, Caucasian skin and hazel eyes; you have a small soul patch. Your nickname on the football field by your peers is Giant.

---
---

The Scholar: William Kepley, you will take your victory through your knowledge, though you don’t have an extensive knowledge of spells and curses yet, it shouldn’t take to long for someone of your genius. Your high I.Q. makes you a bit cocky, but I think it’s that cockiness that will draw your sacrifice to you. You have pale skin, greased down blonde hair and brown eyes.

Being so intelligent, you also have a side job tutoring at college.

---
---

The Ranger: Oscar Zacheriah, you take your victory through your skill and accuracy. All of your peers in the rifle range and archery club are jealous of your ability to get the bulls eye on a far off target every time perfectly. You have a bit of a short temper but it usually doesn’t last long when you’re set off. You have dark chocolate skin, brown eyes, and a head of curly hair.

You work at the rifle range and also are in an archery club in college.

---
---

Now, which path will you take…?
1113.title: Speechless

11132.content:
You awaken the day you have been awaiting for: the day you meet the name that has been marked onto your skin as a sign of the devotion you must give to her. You get out of bed and walk to your bathroom, looking to see "Speechless" marked on your right bicep, as if scratched on. This day will begin your service to your Sacrifice, Speechless, who you must protect with your very life from those who would harm her. As you brush your teeth, you think about the picture you were given of her. Speechless was a young woman named Tanya about your age, so she goes to college like you. Of course, since you found she goes to a college only the rich can afford and the smartest can get scholarships into, you figure she must be very intelligent. You think more about Tanya; she was a pretty attractive girl, though plus-sized. Tanya was a little chubby, mostly in her stomach and hips, but still you saw she was quite cute with her long dark brown hair. And apparently she wasn't exactly undesirable if she didn't have her cat ears or tail anymore (Writer's reminder: Anyone with cat ears and a tail is a virgin, as those features are shedded after sex in Loveless).

Do you still have your ears and tail?
11132.title: Looking for Speechless

112.content:
Now who is the man you are sworn to protect?

Starbright: A tall African American man named Ben. He does not like the idea of a girl protecting him, and lacks his ears.

Mistless: A young Chinese boy who is shorter than you and looks and acts childish. His name is Lan and he is completely perverted. Still has his ears

Lionheart: A skinny and cowardly young man named Max. He still holds his ears and is a big otaku.
112.title: The Name You Obey B

113.content:
So who is the name marked on your body that you shall protect?

Velvet: A long-haired young man named Ren. He is an artist by trade and usually very quiet. He still has his ears

Snowbright: A laughing and goofy young man named Gin. He continually flirts with you and he no longer has his ears.

Speechless: A mute young man with a baby face named Daniel. He communicates through sign language and writing letters on your palm. He still has his ears
113.title: The Name You Obey C

114.content:
A little girl on girl pairing eh? So who is your Sacrifice?

Belated: Her name is Saiyoko, and she's bit on the heavy side. She likes to dress casually and she enjoys playing the violin. She still has her ears

Foxtail: Your Sacrifice's name is Lana, and she's a bit short for her age. She enjoys flowers and still has her ears.

Wingless: You are paired with Vanessa, a tough Gothic girl. She does not have her ears anymore.
114.title: The Name You Obey C

choices: I am a guy with a girl Fighter
I am a girl with a guy Fighter
Both me and my Fighter are guys
Both me and my Fighter are girls
12.content: You must realize as the Sacrifice, your life will be in the greatest danger. Your Fighter will be doing your battles, but you are the one who suffer every moment of pain. Which is your team composed of?
12.title: I am the Sacrifice

121.content:
It may be a little emasculating, but you will be protected by a young woman. Now tell us...what is your true name?

Cat Scratch: You are protected by Naomi, a beautiful Japanese college girl. She transferred from Japan and still has her ears.

Bright Sun: You are protected by Runa, an Amazon of a woman. She is easy to tears and and clumsy fits.

Boundless: You are protected by Bella, a no nonsense girl trained in the art of capoeira, the Brazilian dancing martial art.
121.title: Your True Name A

choices: No. I shedded them off long ago
I keep if I do or do not hidden with a hood or something of the like.
1211.content: Do you still have your ears and tail? In other words, are you seen as a virgin?
1211.title: One Final Question: No Offense But....

1212.content: Do you still have your ears and tail? In other words, are you seen as a virgin?
1212.title: Bright Sun

122.content:
Ah, the classic tale of a man protecting the woman he loves. Now tell us...what is your real name, the name granted to you before you were born?

Shadowless: You are protected by Jonathan, a fine upstart of the British High class. He is well-mannered, yet hides a dark secret within.

Scarlet Rose: You are protected by Dmitri, a quiet giant of man who only speaks to state how you are important to him and how he would die to keep your life safe.

Pathless: You are protected by Freddy, a street tough with whose mouth often spurts foul language and is usually never without a cigarette.
122.title: Your True Name B

123.content:
Nothing wrong with a samurai-type love. What is the name you were granted before you were born?

Intangible: You are paired with Matthias, a white-haired albino who never says much. He seems to be hiding something, but he apparently cares for you. Matthias does not have his ears

Treasured: Your Fighter is named Ryo. He's from Japan, and very skinny, almost like a woman. He's often mistaken for one, which he doesn't mind, and likes to dress in a Yukata (Japanese summer kimono). Ryo still retains his ears and tail.

Shadowless: You have been partnered with Heinz, a brainiac Yuppie-esque young man from Germany. He speaks with an accent and uses stragety to outwit enemies. Steven still have his ears and tail.
123.title: Your True Name C

124.content:
The world may not fully accept your love, but you and your Fighter must endure it all. What is your true name?

Cloudless: Your Fighter is a blonde named Alice, and she is from France. She is a model, but very tough and well trained in Caepoira. She does not have her ears or tail anymore.

Starless: Your Fighter is an African-American girl named Marian. She comes from a rich family and takes you in to protect you. She still holds her ears and tail.

Everbright: Your Fighter is a younger girl with a youthful appearance named Sally. She cares for you, but tends to act like a brat when she doesn't have her way. She still has her ears and tail
124.title: Your True Name D

info.brief_description: Fall in love as you enter this world of intrique
info.description:
In the world of Loveless, you discover you are a part of a terrifying conspiracy. You meet with someone who immediately declares their love of you and never wants to leave your side. Now the two of you must work together in the battles to come.

In Loveless, battles are done between couples (both straight and homosexual). One is called the Fighter Unit and must protect the other, the Sacrifice. The Fighter does all the battling in hopes to defeat the enemy couple, while the Sacrifice must endure all the damage for his/her Fighter Unit. Damage is done in the form of chained bondage that does damage on a mental scale and can kill the Sacrifice if it becomes too much. Without the Sacrifice, the Fighter Unit is powerless. Battles are done with spoken words to cast spells.

Also that should be noted is cat ears and tails are part of those who are still virgins. After sexual intercourse of some sort, they are shedded off.

Now the question is...where do you fit in this battle?
